name: iPhone 13 mini
subtitle: Compact power with flagship performance in your pocket.
description: The iPhone 13 mini is the ultimate compact smartphone, powered by the A15 Bionic chip for lightning-fast performance and exceptional energy efficiency. Its 5.4-inch Super Retina XDR display delivers stunning detail, while the dual-camera system supports Night Mode and Cinematic video recording — all packed into a sleek, pocket-friendly design.
camera_info: Dual-camera system; Night mode and 4K video recording.

name: iPhone 13 Pro
subtitle: Professional-grade camera and speed in a sleek design.
description: Engineered for power users, the iPhone 13 Pro features the supercharged A15 Bionic chip, ProMotion 120Hz refresh rate, and a triple 12MP camera system with LiDAR scanner for advanced low-light photography and AR experiences. With up to 1TB of storage and a bright 6.1-inch OLED display, it's designed to handle anything from creative workflows to intensive gaming.
camera_info: Triple-camera system with LiDAR scanner; ProRAW and ProRes video.

name: iPhone 13 Pro Max
subtitle: The ultimate iPhone experience with cinematic brilliance.
description: The iPhone 13 Pro Max offers Apple’s most advanced features, including a massive 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion, up to 1TB storage, and a powerful triple-lens camera system with LiDAR for detailed night photography and cinematic video. Backed by the A15 Bionic chip, it's built for creators and professionals seeking top-tier performance and battery life.
camera_info: Triple-camera with larger sensors; Cinematic mode.

name: iPhone 13
subtitle: Everyday performance meets stunning camera clarity.
description: Balancing performance and style, the iPhone 13 brings a vibrant 6.1-inch OLED display, powerful A15 Bionic chip, and dual cameras with Cinematic Mode and Photographic Styles. Its improved battery life, sleek flat-edge design, and durable Ceramic Shield front make it a versatile choice for everyday users.
camera_info: Dual-camera system with improved low-light performance.

name: iPhone 12 Pro Max
subtitle: Big screen, big power, and pro-level photography.
description: Designed for professionals, the iPhone 12 Pro Max features a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, triple 12MP camera system with LiDAR, and the A14 Bionic chip for ultra-fast performance. With advanced Dolby Vision HDR recording and MagSafe compatibility, it’s perfect for photography, video editing, and premium multimedia use.
camera_info: Triple-camera with LiDAR sensor; 5x digital zoom.

name: iPhone 12 Pro
subtitle: Elegant design with advanced camera versatility.
description: The iPhone 12 Pro delivers powerful performance through the A14 Bionic chip and supports 5G connectivity for lightning-fast downloads. It includes a 6.1-inch OLED display, a LiDAR sensor for better AR and night photography, and a pro-grade triple camera system – all wrapped in a stainless steel body.

name: iPhone 12
subtitle: Fast, stylish, and built for vibrant everyday use.
description: Smart, sleek, and fast — the iPhone 12 features a 6.1-inch OLED display, A14 Bionic chip, and 5G support. The dual-camera system brings Night Mode to both lenses, while Ceramic Shield ensures added durability. It’s the ideal choice for users looking for performance and design at a great value.

name: iPhone 12 mini
subtitle: Small in size, bold in performance and design.
description: The iPhone 12 mini is the world’s smallest, thinnest 5G smartphone, combining a compact 5.4-inch OLED screen with the power of the A14 Bionic chip. Enjoy the same dual-camera system and MagSafe functionality as the iPhone 12, but in a mini form perfect for those who value portability without compromise.
camera_info: Compact dual-camera phone with Night mode.

name: iPhone SE (2020)
subtitle: Classic style meets modern power at a great value.
description: The iPhone SE (2nd generation) offers incredible value with the same A13 Bionic chip found in the iPhone 11 Pro. It retains the classic design with a 4.7-inch Retina HD display and Touch ID, while supporting powerful features like 4K video recording, wireless charging, and water resistance — all at an affordable price point.

name: iPhone 11 Pro Max
subtitle: Capture more with a larger screen and triple camera.
description: Built for maximum performance and screen real estate, the iPhone 11 Pro Max comes with a 6.5-inch OLED display, triple-camera system with 4K video, and the A13 Bionic chip. It features all-day battery life, Face ID, and stunning color accuracy — a strong choice for users seeking immersive visuals and pro features.
camera_info: Triple-camera with Deep Fusion and Night mode.

name: iPhone 11 Pro
subtitle: Smooth performance with pro-level camera precision.
description: The iPhone 11 Pro features a 5.8-inch Super Retina XDR display, triple-camera setup with Night Mode, and smooth performance from the A13 Bionic chip. With a compact build and premium matte glass finish, it's ideal for professionals who want power in a smaller size.
camera_info: Triple-camera with improved HDR and 4K video.

name: iPhone 11
subtitle: Dual-camera simplicity with vibrant all-day power.
description: Smart, fast, and colorful, the iPhone 11 is powered by the A13 Bionic chip and features a 6.1-inch Liquid Retina LCD, dual 12MP cameras with Night Mode, and excellent battery life. A great option for everyday users wanting performance and camera versatility at a reasonable price.
camera_info: Dual-camera system with 4K video and Night mode.

name: iPhone XS Max
subtitle: Larger display, premium feel, and smart performance.
description: The iPhone XS Max boasts a large 6.5-inch Super Retina OLED display, Face ID, and a dual-camera system with Smart HDR. Powered by the A12 Bionic chip, it offers smooth multitasking, vibrant visuals, and a premium glass and stainless steel design for users who love big screens and seamless performance.
camera_info: Dual-camera with Smart HDR and 2x optical zoom.

name: iPhone XR
subtitle: Colorful, fast, and made for fun and function.
description: Vivid and powerful, the iPhone XR features a 6.1-inch Liquid Retina display, Face ID, and the A12 Bionic chip. It comes in a variety of bright colors and delivers excellent battery life and performance, making it a fun and functional phone for casual users.
camera_info: Single 12MP camera; Portrait mode and Smart HDR.

name: iPhone XS
subtitle: Refined design with dual-camera intelligence.
description: Compact yet capable, the iPhone XS features a 5.8-inch OLED display, dual 12MP cameras, and Face ID. With its A12 Bionic chip and glass-body finish, it provides a high-end iPhone experience in a more pocket-friendly design.
camera_info: Dual-camera setup; 4K video with stereo sound recording.
